titleStmt.title: The doctrine of passive obedience and jure divino disproved and obedience to the present government, proved from Scripture, law, and reason. Written for the satisfaction of all those who are dissatisfyed at the present government: by a lay-man of the Church of England.
titleStmt.author: Harrison, T. (Thomas), fl. 1683-1711.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Randal Taylor near Stationers-Hall,

notesStmt.note: A lay-man of the Church of England = Thomas Harrison. Cf. Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
